meaning_str.bing:
n. 洗澡；浴缸；洗浴；浴盆
v. 洗澡；给…洗澡
网络. 巴斯；巴斯大学；浴室

（baths）澡堂；公共浴室；（室内）公共游泳池

sogou-kaoyan.n: 洗澡; 淋浴[出现0次)];浴室(池、盆)[出现0次)]

sogou-gaokao.n: 浴室; [pl.]洗澡处; 温泉浴场[出现1次)];(Bath)巴斯[出现1次)];洗澡水; 浴盆[出现0次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 浴室; [pl.]洗澡处; 温泉浴场[出现5次)];(Bath)巴斯[出现4次)];洗澡水; 浴盆[出现1次)]

1.en: One day, she began to take a bath, he stopped her at the door, "Let me take it first , OK? "
1.cn: 一天她想洗澡把丈夫拦在了门外“让我先洗好嘛？”

2.en: The trouble was that everyone kept getting on and off the bus at all the stops between downtown and his bath house.
2.cn: 在市区去他浴室的路途上，乘客在所有的站点都不停的上下，这很麻烦。

3.en: After he took his bath, he dressed in a hurry, ran to catch the bus, and got to his appointment before it was too late.
3.cn: 他洗完澡，匆忙穿好衣服，一路小跑赶上公共汽车，到了约会地点的时候总算还不太晚。

0.en: At bath time, George shares his bath with Mr. Dinosaur.
0.cn: 洗澡的时候，乔治和恐龙先生一起洗。

1.en: At bath time, George shares his bath with Mr. Dinosaur.
1.cn: 洗澡的时候，乔治和恐龙先生一起洗。

2.en: It is bath time. Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
2.cn: 洗澡时间到了！佩佩想穿着她的新鞋，即使是去洗澡。

3.en: It is bath time. Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
3.cn: 洗澡时间到了。但佩琪不想脱下新鞋子，想穿着它洗澡。

4.en: It is bath time. Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
4.cn: 洗澡时间到了。但佩奇不想脱下新鞋子，想穿着它洗澡。

5.en: Simba. I'm kind of in the middle of a bath. And it's time for yours.
5.cn: 辛巴，我现在正在洗澡啊你也该洗澡罗。

6.en: Yes, bath time I think. Baby Alexander is having a bath. This is Mr. Dinosaur. Can you say dinosaur? Go-go.
6.cn: 是的，我想他该洗澡了。小宝宝亚历山大要洗澡了。这个就是恐龙，你会说恐龙这个词吗？公公！

7.en: Peppa. George. Bath time. Daddy. Mummy. We found the biggest muddy puddle in the world. I can see that. Quick, into the bath.
7.cn: 佩奇，乔治，该洗澡了。爸爸，妈妈，我们找到了世界上最大的一个泥坑。我看见泥坑了。快，进来洗澡。

8.en: I wore them in bed, in the bath, all summer long.
8.cn: 睡觉也穿着，洗澡也穿着，整个夏天都穿着。

9.en: George wants to play with Dino Roar in the bath. George, if you get Dino Roar wet, he'll stop working. George cannot play with Dino Roar in the bath.
9.cn: 乔治想在洗澡的时候和轰鸣龙一起玩。乔治，如果你把轰鸣龙弄湿了，他就会坏掉的。乔治也不能再洗澡的时候和轰鸣龙一起玩。

10.en: I know. I know where he is. George always has Mr. Dinosaur with him in the bath. So Mr. Dinosaur is in the bath. Mr. Dinosaur is not in the bath.
10.cn: 我知道，我知道他在哪里了。乔治总是在洗澡的时候让恐龙先生陪着。所以恐龙先生是在浴缸里。恐龙先生不在浴缸里。

11.en: I know. I know where he is. George always has Mr. Dinosaur with him in the bath. So Mr. Dinosaur is in the bath. Mr. Dinosaur is not in the bath.
11.cn: 我知道，我知道他在哪里了。乔治总是在洗澡的时候让恐龙先生陪着。所以恐龙先生是在浴缸里。恐龙先生不在浴缸里。

12.en: We found the biggest muddy puddle in the world. I can see that. Quick, into the bath.
12.cn: 我们找到了世界上最大的一个泥坑。我看见泥坑了。快，进来洗澡。

13.en: All right. But you must come in when we call you for your bath. I don't know where they get their energy from.
13.cn: 好吧。但是我们叫你们洗澡的时候你们必须进来。我不知道他们哪里来的精力。

14.en: Oh, can't we just stay in the bath a little bit longer. Bathtime is over! Now, it's time to clean your teeth.
14.cn: 噢，我们不能再在浴缸里多呆一会儿吗？洗澡时间结束了！现在，该清洁你们的牙齿了。

15.en: That's enough splashing. Let's get you dry and into your pajamas. Oh, can't we just stay in the bath for a little bit longer. Bath time is over. Now, it's time to clean your teeth.
15.cn: 别再玩了，快停下。快出来擦干把睡衣穿上。我们可以在浴缸里多呆一会儿吗，妈妈？洗澡时间结束，现在是刷牙时间。

16.en: That's enough splashing. Let's get you dry and into your pajamas. Oh, can't we just stay in the bath for a little bit longer. Bath time is over. Now, it's time to clean your teeth.
16.cn: 别再玩了，快停下。快出来擦干把睡衣穿上。我们可以在浴缸里多呆一会儿吗，妈妈？洗澡时间结束，现在是刷牙时间。

17.en: Oh. What's wrong? I drew my own bath, but I did it wrong. The water's tepid. The salt didn't dissolve and is now lodged places.
17.cn: 怎么了？我自己放洗澡水，但我没有弄对水温温的，浴盐无法溶解，现在它们结块了。

18.en: Bath time. Oh, but what if the birdies come back? Don't worry, Peppa. I'll make sure the birds don't eat the seeds.
18.cn: 佩奇乔治来洗澡了！哦，要是小鸟又回来吃种子怎么办？别担心佩奇，我来看着不让小鸟吃掉种子。

19.en: Before bedtime, Peppa and George have their bath. Peppa likes splashing. George likes splashing. Peppa and George both like splashing.
19.cn: 睡觉之前，佩奇和乔治要洗澡。佩奇喜欢泼水，乔治也喜欢泼水，佩奇和乔治都喜欢泼水。
